about_the_game: The EMD SD80MAC is a six-axle, 5,000-horsepower, AC-traction diesel locomotive built from 1995 to 1996. Only 30 examples were ever built, all purchased by Conrail. Today, all are owned by Norfolk Southern. The CSX YN3 paint scheme was used until the units were repainted into the NS scheme in 2009.
detailed_description: The EMD SD80MAC is a six-axle, 5,000-horsepower, AC-traction diesel locomotive built from 1995 to 1996. Only 30 examples were ever built, all purchased by Conrail. Today, all are owned by Norfolk Southern. The CSX YN3 paint scheme was used until the units were repainted into the NS scheme in 2009.
